Its curriculum addresses issues of power and resistance and connects feminist theories and research to public policy and social justice. Classes focus on feminist and social justice theory with an emphasis on agency, social responsibility, advocacy and activism. You’ll develop strong writing and critical thinking skills and learn to make connections between theory and real-world practice.
